item.description:
Hello,

It's time for Boston Karaoke Meetup March 2009 get together.

*********ATTENTION*************************************
I have changed the Venue!!! We are now having it at the Limelight in Boston. Please plan accordingly.

We've used the Limelight many times before and it's a really nice location.
*******************************************************

We have the place booked from 7-9PM. Please try to come right at 7PM so you can sing as many songs as possible. The last few Meetups, we've been able to sing 5-6 songs each.

-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for me or Boston Karaoke Meetup, if needed call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - March 21, 2009
